MktJourneyDcsnSetup.name: MktJourneyDcsnSetup
MktJourneyDcsnSetup.description: Represents a collection of Marketing Cloud Engagement journeys that you can interact with by using Salesforce Flow in Marketing Cloud.

BusinessUnitId.description: The unique Marketing Cloud business unit ID to use with the collection of journeysâ€Œ. This ID is configured in Marketing Cloud, and is different from the Member ID (MID) or Enterprise ID (EID) of your Marketing Cloud Engagement account.

Description.description: A description of the collection of journeys.

EnterpriseIdentifier.description: The Enterprise ID (EID) of your parent Marketing Cloud Engagement account.

Name.description: A name for the collection of journeys.
